verses.verse: And there came <S%H935><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> angels <S%H4397><s%> to Sodom <S%H5467><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>; and Lot <S%H3876><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%>: and Lot <S%H3876><s%> seeing <S%H7200><s%> them rose up <S%H6965><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> them; and he bowed <S%H7812><s%> himself with his face <S%H639><s%> toward the ground <S%H776><s%>;

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Behold now, my lords <S%H113><s%>, turn in <S%H5493><s%>, I pray you, into your servant's <S%H5650><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, and tarry all night <S%H3885><s%>, and wash <S%H7364><s%> your feet <S%H7272><s%>, and ye shall rise up early <S%H7925><s%>, and go <S%H1980><s%> on your ways <S%H1870><s%>. And they said <S%H559><s%>, Nay; but we will abide <S%H3885><s%> in the street <S%H7339><s%> all night <S%H3885><s%>.

And he pressed <S%H6484><s%> upon them greatly <S%H3966><s%>; and they turned in <S%H5493><s%> unto him, and entered <S%H935><s%> into his house <S%H1004><s%>; and he made <S%H6213><s%> them a feast <S%H4960><s%>, and did bake <S%H644><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>, and they did eat <S%H398><s%>.

¶ But before they lay down <S%H7901><s%>, the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, even the men <S%H582><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%>, compassed <S%H5437><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> round <S%H5437><s%>, both old <S%H2205><s%> and young <S%H5288><s%>, all the people <S%H5971><s%> from every quarter <S%H7097><s%>:

And they called <S%H7121><s%> unto Lot <S%H3876><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Where are the men <S%H582><s%> which came in <S%H935><s%> to thee this night <S%H3915><s%>? bring them out <S%H3318><s%> unto us, that we may know <S%H3045><s%> them.
And Lot <S%H3876><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> unto them, and shut <S%H5462><s%> the door <S%H1817><s%> after him <S%H310><s%>,
And said <S%H559><s%>, I pray you, brethren <S%H251><s%>, do not so wickedly <S%H7489><s%>.

Behold now, I have two <S%H8147><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> which have not known <S%H3045><s%> man <S%H376><s%>; let me, I pray you, bring them out <S%H3318><s%> unto you, and do <S%H6213><s%> ye to them as is good <S%H2896><s%> in your eyes <S%H5869><s%>: only unto these <S%H411><s%> men <S%H582><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> nothing <S%H408><s%> <S%H1697><s%>; for therefore came <S%H935><s%> they under the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of my roof <S%H6982><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%>, Stand <S%H5066><s%> back <S%H1973><s%>. And they said <S%H559><s%> again, This one <S%H259><s%> fellow came in <S%H935><s%> to sojourn <S%H1481><s%>, and he will needs <S%H8199><s%> be a judge <S%H8199><s%>: now will we deal worse <S%H7489><s%> with thee, than with them. And they pressed <S%H6484><s%> sore <S%H3966><s%> upon the man <S%H376><s%>, even Lot <S%H3876><s%>, and came near <S%H5066><s%> to break <S%H7665><s%> the door <S%H1817><s%>.

But the men <S%H582><s%> put forth <S%H7971><s%> their hand <S%H3027><s%>, and pulled <S%H935><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> to them, and shut <S%H5462><s%> to the door <S%H1817><s%>.

And they smote <S%H5221><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> that were at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> with blindness <S%H5575><s%>, both small <S%H6996><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%>: so that they wearied <S%H3811><s%> themselves to find <S%H4672><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%>.

¶ And the men <S%H582><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Lot <S%H3876><s%>, Hast thou here <S%H6311><s%> any <S%H4310><s%> besides? son in law <S%H2860><s%>, and thy sons <S%H1121><s%>, and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and whatsoever <S%H834><s%> thou hast in the city <S%H5892><s%>, bring them out <S%H3318><s%> of this place <S%H4725><s%>:

For we <S%H587><s%> will destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H853><s%> this place <S%H4725><s%>, because the cry of them <S%H6818><s%> is waxen great <S%H1431><s%> before <S%H854><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath sent <S%H7971><s%> us to destroy <S%H7843><s%> it.

And Lot <S%H3876><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> unto his sons in law <S%H2860><s%>, which married <S%H3947><s%> his daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Up <S%H6965><s%>, get you out <S%H3318><s%> of this place <S%H4725><s%>; for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will destroy <S%H7843><s%> this city <S%H5892><s%>. But he seemed as one that mocked <S%H6711><s%> unto <S%H5869><s%> his sons in law <S%H2860><s%>.

¶ And when <S%H3644><s%> the morning <S%H7837><s%> arose <S%H5927><s%>, then the angels <S%H4397><s%> hastened <S%H213><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Arise <S%H6965><s%>, take <S%H3947><s%> thy wife <S%H802><s%>, and thy two <S%H8147><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%>, which are here <S%H4672><s%>; lest thou be consumed <S%H5595><s%> in the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And while he lingered <S%H4102><s%>, the men <S%H582><s%> laid hold <S%H2388><s%> upon his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and upon the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his wife <S%H802><s%>, and upon the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his two <S%H8147><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%>; the LORD <S%H3068><s%> being merciful <S%H2551><s%> unto him: and they brought him forth <S%H3318><s%>, and set him <S%H3240><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>.

¶ And it came to pass, when they had brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> abroad <S%H2351><s%>, that he said <S%H559><s%>, Escape <S%H4422><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> thy life <S%H5315><s%>; look <S%H5027><s%> not behind thee <S%H310><s%>, neither stay <S%H5975><s%> thou in all the plain <S%H3603><s%>; escape <S%H4422><s%> to the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, lest thou be consumed <S%H5595><s%>.
And Lot <S%H3876><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Oh, not so, my Lord <S%H113><s%>:

Behold now, thy servant <S%H5650><s%> hath found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%>, and thou hast magnified <S%H1431><s%> thy mercy <S%H2617><s%>, which thou hast shewed <S%H6213><s%> unto me <S%H5978><s%> in saving <S%H2421><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%>; and I cannot <S%H3201><s%> escape <S%H4422><s%> to the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, lest some evil <S%H7451><s%> take <S%H1692><s%> me, and I die <S%H4191><s%>:

Behold now, this city <S%H5892><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> to flee <S%H5127><s%> unto, and it <S%H1931><s%> is a little one <S%H4705><s%>: Oh, let me escape <S%H4422><s%> thither, (is it not a little one <S%H4705><s%>?) and my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall live <S%H2421><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto him, See <S%H2009><s%>, I have accepted <S%H5375><s%> thee <S%H6440><s%> concerning this thing <S%H1697><s%> also, that I will not overthrow <S%H2015><s%> this city <S%H5892><s%>, for the which <S%H834><s%> thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%>.

Haste <S%H4116><s%> thee, escape <S%H4422><s%> thither; for I cannot <S%H3201><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> any thing <S%H1697><s%> till thou be come <S%H935><s%> thither. Therefore the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Zoar <S%H6820><s%>.
¶ The sun <S%H8121><s%> was risen <S%H3318><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%> when Lot <S%H3876><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> into Zoar <S%H6820><s%>.

Then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> rained <S%H4305><s%> upon Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and upon Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%> brimstone <S%H1614><s%> and fire <S%H784><s%> from the LORD <S%H3068><s%> out of heaven <S%H8064><s%>;

And he overthrew <S%H2015><s%> those <S%H411><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>, and all the plain <S%H3603><s%>, and all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%>, and that which grew <S%H6780><s%> upon the ground <S%H127><s%>.
¶ But his wife <S%H802><s%> looked back <S%H5027><s%> from behind him <S%H310><s%>, and she became a pillar <S%H5333><s%> of salt <S%H4417><s%>.
¶ And Abraham <S%H85><s%> gat up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> where he stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>:

And he looked <S%H8259><s%> toward <S%H6440><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%>, and toward <S%H6440><s%> all the land <S%H776><s%> of the plain <S%H3603><s%>, and beheld <S%H7200><s%>, and, lo, the smoke <S%H7008><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> as the smoke <S%H7008><s%> of a furnace <S%H3536><s%>.

¶ And it came to pass, when God <S%H430><s%> destroyed <S%H7843><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the plain <S%H3603><s%>, that God <S%H430><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>, and sent <S%H7971><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the overthrow <S%H2018><s%>, when he overthrew <S%H2015><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> in the which <S%H2004><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%>.

¶ And Lot <S%H3876><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> out of Zoar <S%H6820><s%>, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, and his two <S%H8147><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> with him; for he feared <S%H3372><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Zoar <S%H6820><s%>: and he dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in a cave <S%H4631><s%>, he and his two <S%H8147><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

And the firstborn <S%H1067><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the younger <S%H6810><s%>, Our father <S%H1><s%> is old <S%H2204><s%>, and there is not a man <S%H376><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> to come in <S%H935><s%> unto us after the manner <S%H1870><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%>:

Come <S%H3212><s%>, let us make <S%H8248><s%> our father <S%H1><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%>, and we will lie <S%H7901><s%> with him, that we may preserve <S%H2421><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> of our father <S%H1><s%>.

And they made <S%H8248><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%>: and the firstborn <S%H1067><s%> went in <S%H935><s%>, and lay <S%H7901><s%> with her father <S%H1><s%>; and he perceived <S%H3045><s%> not when she lay down <S%H7901><s%>, nor when she arose <S%H6965><s%>.

And it came to pass on the morrow <S%H4283><s%>, that the firstborn <S%H1067><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the younger <S%H6810><s%>, Behold, I lay <S%H7901><s%> yesternight <S%H570><s%> with my father <S%H1><s%>: let us make him drink <S%H8248><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> this night <S%H3915><s%> also; and go thou in <S%H935><s%>, and lie <S%H7901><s%> with him, that we may preserve <S%H2421><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> of our father <S%H1><s%>.

And they made <S%H8248><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> also: and the younger <S%H6810><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%>, and lay <S%H7901><s%> with him; and he perceived <S%H3045><s%> not when she lay down <S%H7901><s%>, nor when she arose <S%H6965><s%>.
Thus were both <S%H8147><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Lot <S%H3876><s%> with child <S%H2029><s%> by their father <S%H1><s%>.

And the firstborn <S%H1067><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%>: the same <S%H1931><s%> is the father <S%H1><s%> of the Moabites <S%H4124><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And the younger <S%H6810><s%>, she also bare <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Ben-ammi <S%H1151><s%>: the same is the father <S%H1><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.
